trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Thomasville
There were no other sightings in Thomasville on or around July 8th 2012
divs: sighting detailsi was laying on my back in the pool on a float thinking and looking at the stars.. as a movment off to the left drew my attention to a fast moving light at first glance i thought\hoped it was a meteor, then a second and as the speed was slow and jet like i went back to thinking about things and how cool technology and plains have gotten to go so fast, and then.. straight up, i saw the brightest star ever and it kept getting brighter untill i realised, "this is it.. im dead.. i guess it was a 2012 meteor"..then, it makes a left tward the east and out of sight.. my next thought was "rocket re-directed"? "check the news.. as hour or so goes by, internet say im not the only one to see it.. and the jets.
Summary: Orb of light mistaken for meteor makes a right turn away from jets
